Detailed Description

The class select datas in the snipet Sqlite base and provide information in tree.

This class select in the base all categories and all snipets in a QSqlQueryTable and transform this source model to a tree model with the help of TreeProxyItemModel.

This class can be subclassing to hide some column, and add other feature as Drag & Drop.

Destroy the BaseSnipetItemModel.

BaseSnipetItemModel::BaseSnipetItemModel ( QSqlDatabase  db,
QObject *  parent = 0 
) [protected]

Create a BaseSnipetItemModel.

Create a BaseSnipetItemModel, and load categories and snipets from the db base. For this purpose, BaseSnipetItemModel create a QSqlQueryModel used as source model of a TreeProxyItemModel.

Parameters:
db Base where BaseSnipetItemModel must load the content of it's structure.
parent Parent object of the new instance of BaseSnipetItemModel.

Member Function Documentation

QVariant BaseSnipetItemModel::data ( const QModelIndex &  index,
int  role = Qt::DisplayRole 
) const [virtual]

Returns the data stored under the given role for the item referred to by the index.

This method return more information that the default implementation in QAbstractItemModel.

Parameters:
role If the role have BaseSnipetItemModel::SnipetIdRole, data() returns the id of the snipet or id of the category. If the role have BaseSnipetItemModel::SnipetTypeRole, data() returns CATEGORY or SNIPET to tell if the index is a Category or a Snipet.(String form) If the role have BaseSnipetItemModel::SnipetParentIdRole, data() returns the parent identifier of the index.
index The index where data must search information.
Returns:
Information stored in a QVariant.

Reimplemented from TreeProxyItemModel.

Reimplemented in SnipetDockItemModel, and SnipetItemModel.

int BaseSnipetItemModel::getParentUniqueIdentifier ( const QModelIndex &  sourceIndex  )  const [protected, virtual]

Calculate the unique identifier for the parent of a given source index.

To calculate the unique identifier, this method read the parent id of the selected row (ignoring sourceIndex.column()) and calulate the unique identifier with getTreeModelIdentifier(). The type column is not used. For a category or a snipet, the parent is always a category.

Parameters:
sourceIndex the index in the source model.
Returns:
a unique identifier for the parent of sourceIndex in the tree model
See also:
getTreeModelIdentifier(), getUniqueIdentifier()

Implements TreeProxyItemModel.

int BaseSnipetItemModel::getTreeModelIdentifier ( QString  type,
int  id 
) const [protected]

Calculate the unique identifier for a type and an id.

Calculate the unique identifier used in methode getUniqueIdentifier() and getParentUniqueIdentifier(). For this, the method used the qHash methode on a string generated from the type and the id.

Parameters:
type Type of line in the source model. The value can be CATEGORY or SNIPET.
id the unique identifier in the snipet list or in the category list on the source model.
Returns:
a unique identifier for the tree model
See also:
getUniqueIdentifier(), getParentUniqueIdentifier()

int BaseSnipetItemModel::getUniqueIdentifier ( const QModelIndex &  sourceIndex  )  const [protected, virtual]

Calculate the unique identifier for a given source index.

To calculate the unique identifier, this method read the type and the id columns for the selected row (ignoring sourceIndex.column()) and calulate the unique identifier with getTreeModelIdentifier().

Parameters:
sourceIndex the index in the source model.
Returns:
a unique identifier for the tree model
See also:
getTreeModelIdentifier(), getParentUniqueIdentifier()

Implements TreeProxyItemModel.

QModelIndex BaseSnipetItemModel::index ( bool  isCategory,
int  id 
) const [virtual]

Calculate the tree QModelIndex for a given type and id.

This methode use TreeProxyItemModel::index(int) to calculate the tree QModelIndex for a unique identifier. As getUniqueIdentifier(), this methode use isCategory and id to calculate the tree unique identifier.

Parameters:
isCategory must be true, if the line search is a category, false for a snipet
Returns:
An index in the tree model.
See also:
getTreeModelIdentifier()

QList< int > BaseSnipetItemModel::indexesToIds ( const QModelIndexList &  indexes  )  const

For a given list of index, return a list of snipets.

This method return for a given list of index, all the snipet in the category and in the child category. If the index refere to a snipet, the snipet is directly added.

Parameters:
indexes List of index to convert
Returns:
list of snipet identifier.

void BaseSnipetItemModel::indexesToIds ( const QModelIndexList &  indexes,
QList< int > &  snipetIds,
QList< int > &  categoryIds 
) const

Return for a list of index, all the snipet and categories.

For each index in the indexes list, this method store the id in he snipetIds list or in the categoryIds list.

Parameters:
indexes The list of index to convert
snipetIds list of id passed by reference
categoryIds list of id passed by reference

void BaseSnipetItemModel::select (  )  [slot]

Select all categories and snipets in the source model.

This method select all the categories and snipets from the source model and re-create the internal structure of the TreeProxyItemModel by calling createMapping()
